name: Project

list.name: down
list.description: Put the application into maintenance mode

list.name: preset
list.description: Swap the front-end scaffolding for the application

list.name: serve
list.description: Serve the application on the PHP development server

list.name: up
list.description: Bring the application out of maintenance mode

list.name: cache:forget
list.description: Remove an item from the cache

list.name: cache:table
list.description: Create a migration for the cache database table

list.name: config:cache
list.description: Create a cache file for faster configuration loading

list.name: db:wipe
list.description: Drop all tables, views, and types

list.name: event:cache
list.description: Discover and cache the application's events and listeners

list.name: event:clear
list.description: Clear all cached events and listeners

list.name: event:generate
list.description: Generate the missing events and listeners based on registration

list.name: event:list
list.description: List the application's events and listeners

list.name: make:exception
list.description: Create a new custom exception class

list.name: make:listener
list.description: Create a new event listener class

list.name: make:model
list.description: Create a new Eloquent model class

list.name: make:provider
list.description: Create a new service provider class

list.name: make:request
list.description: Create a new form request class

list.name: migrate:fresh
list.description: Drop all tables and re-run all migrations

list.name: migrate:status
list.description: Show the status of each migration

list.name: notifications:table
list.description: Create a migration for the notifications table

list.name: queue:failed
list.description: List all of the failed queue jobs

list.name: queue:failed-table
list.description: Create a migration for the failed queue jobs database table

list.name: queue:flush
list.description: Flush all of the failed queue jobs

list.name: queue:restart
list.description: Restart queue worker daemons after their current job

list.name: queue:table
list.description: Create a migration for the queue jobs database table

list.name: queue:work
list.description: Start processing jobs on the queue as a daemon

list.name: route:cache
list.description: Create a route cache file for faster route registration

list.name: session:table
list.description: Create a migration for the session database table

list.name: storage:link
list.description: Create a symbolic link from "public/storage" to "storage/app/public"

list.name: vendor:publish
list.description: Publish any publishable assets from vendor packages

list.name: view:cache
list.description: Compile all of the application's Blade templates

list.name: Controller
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
use {{ request.getFullName(project, entity) }};
use {{ model.getFullName(project, entity) }};

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends Controller
{
    protected $routePath = '{{ entity.snakeCase }}';
    protected $viewPath = '{{ entity.snakeCase }}';

    /**
     * Display a listing of the resource.
     *
     * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\View\View
     */
    public function index()
    {
        $page = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->paginate();
        return view("$this->viewPath.index", compact('page'));
    }

    /**
     * Show the form for creating a new resource.
     *
     * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\View\View
     */
    public function create()
    {
        $item = new {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}();
        $item->_token = csrf_token();
        $item->_uri = "/$this->routePath";
        return view("$this->viewPath.edit", compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Store a newly created resource in storage.
     *
     * @param {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request
     * @return \Illuminate\Routing\Redirector
     */
    public function store({{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request)
    {
        $item = new {{ model.getClassName(entity) }};
        $item->fill($request->validated());
        $item->save();
        return redirect("/$this->routePath/$item->id");
    }

    /**
     * Display the specified resource.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\View\View
     */
    public function show($id)
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->findOrFail($id);
        return view("$this->viewPath.show", compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Show the form for editing the specified resource.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\View\View
     */
    public function edit($id)
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->findOrFail($id);
        $item->_token = csrf_token();
        $item->_method = 'PATCH';
        $item->_uri = "/$this->routePath/$item->id";
        return view("$this->viewPath.edit", compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Update the specified resource in storage.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @param {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request
     * @return \Illuminate\Routing\Redirector
     */
    public function update($id, {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request)
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->findOrFail($id);
        $item->update($request->validated());
        return redirect("/$this->routePath/$item->id");
    }

    /**
     * Remove the specified resource from storage.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @return \Illuminate\Routing\Redirector
     */
    public function destroy($id)
    {
        {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::destroy($id);
        return redirect("/$this->routePath");
    }
}

list.name: ControllerAPI
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
use {{ request.getFullName(project, entity) }};
use {{ model.getFullName(project, entity) }};

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends Controller
{

    /**
     * Display a listing of the resource.
     *
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse
     */
    public function index()
    {
        $page = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->paginate();
        return response()->json(compact('page'));
    }

    /**
     * Store a newly created resource in storage.
     *
     * @param {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse
     */
    public function store({{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request)
    {
        $item = new {{ model.getClassName(entity) }};
        $item->fill($request->validated());
        $item->save();
        return response()->json(compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Display the specified resource.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse
     */
    public function show($id)
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->findOrFail($id);
        return response()->json(compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Update the specified resource in storage.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @param {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse
     */
    public function update($id, {{ request.getClassName(entity) }} $request)
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::query()->findOrFail($id);
        $item->update($request->validated());
        return response()->json(compact('item'));
    }

    /**
     * Remove the specified resource from storage.
     *
     * @param int $id
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse
     */
    public function destroy($id)
    {
        $count = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::destroy($id);
        if ($count) {
            return response()->json('OK');
        }
        return response()->json('Resource already deleted!', 410);
    }
}

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use Closure;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }}
{
    /**
     * Handle an incoming request.
     *
     * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
     * @param  \Closure(\Illuminate\Http\Request): (\Illuminate\Http\Response|\Illuminate\Http\RedirectResponse)  $next

     */
    public function handle(Request $request, Closure $next)
    {
        return $next($request);
    }
}

list.name: Model
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Factories\HasFactory;
use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

/**
 * Class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }}
 * @package {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }}
 * {% for field in entity.fieldManager.list %}
 * @property {{ phptype(field) }} ${{ field.name }}{% endfor %}
 */
class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends Model
{
    use HasFactory;

    /**
     * The table associated with the model.
     *
     * @var string
     */
    protected $table = '{{ entity.tableName }}';

    /**
     * The primary key for the model.
     *
     * @var string
     */
    protected $primaryKey = '{{ entity.primaryKey }}';

    /**
     * Indicates if the IDs are auto-incrementing.
     *
     * @var bool
     */
    public $incrementing = {{ entity.fieldManager.hasIncrement }};

    /**
     * Indicates if the model should be timestamped.
     *
     * @var bool
     */
    public $timestamps = {{ entity.hasTimeStamp}};

    /**
     * The attributes that are mass assignable.
     *
     * @var array<int, string>
     */
    protected $fillable = [
{% for field in entity.fieldManager.list | selectattr('fillable') %}
        '{{ field.name }}',
{% endfor %}
    ];

    /**
     * The attributes that are mass assignable.
     *
     * @var array<int, string>
     */
    protected $hidden = [
{% for field in entity.fieldManager.list | selectattr('hidden') %}
        '{{ field.name }}',
{% endfor %}
    ];

    /**
     * The attributes that should be cast.
     *
     * @var array<string, string>
     */
    protected $casts = [
{% for field in entity.fieldManager.list | selectattr('cast') %}
        '{{ field.name }}' => '{{ field.cast }}',
{% endfor %}
    ];

{% for relation in entity.relationManager.list %}
    public function {{ relation.name }}()
    {
        return $this->{{ relation.type }}({{ relation.parameter }});
    }
{% endfor %}
}

list.name: Notification
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use Illuminate\Bus\Queueable;
use Illuminate\Contracts\Queue\ShouldQueue;
use Illuminate\Notifications\Messages\MailMessage;
use Illuminate\Notifications\Notification;

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends Notification
{
    use Queueable;

    /**
     * Create a new notification instance.
     *
     * @return void
     */
    public function __construct()
    {
        //
    }

    /**
     * Get the notification's delivery channels.
     *
     * @param  mixed  $notifiable
     * @return array
     */
    public function via($notifiable)
    {
        return ['mail'];
    }

    /**
     * Get the mail representation of the notification.
     *
     * @param  mixed  $notifiable
     * @return \Illuminate\Notifications\Messages\MailMessage
     */
    public function toMail($notifiable)
    {
        return (new MailMessage)
                    ->line('The introduction to the notification.')
                    ->action('Notification Action', url('/'))
                    ->line('Thank you for using our application!');
    }

    /**
     * Get the array representation of the notification.
     *
     * @param  mixed  $notifiable
     * @return array
     */
    public function toArray($notifiable)
    {
        return [
            //
        ];
    }
}

list.name: Policy
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use {{ model.getFullName(project, entity) }};
use {{ model.getFullName(project, user) }};
use Illuminate\Auth\Access\HandlesAuthorization;

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }}
{
    use HandlesAuthorization;

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can view any item.
     *
     * @param  User $user
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function viewAny(User $user)
    {
        return true;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can view the item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @param {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function view(User $user, {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item)
    {
        return true;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can create item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function create(User $user)
    {
        return true;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can update the item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @param {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function update(User $user, {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item)
    {
        return $user->id === $item->user_id;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can delete the item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @param {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function delete(User $user, {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item)
    {
        return $user->id === $item->user_id;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can restore the item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @param {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function restore(User $user, {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item)
    {
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * Determine whether the user can permanently delete the item.
     *
     * @param User $user
     * @param {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item
     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response|bool
     */
    public function forceDelete(User $user, {{ model.getClassName(entity) }} $item)
    {
        return false;
    }
}

list.name: Base
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

use {{ model.getFullName(project, entity) }};
use Illuminate\Foundation\Testing\RefreshDatabase;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Testing\WithFaker;
use Tests\TestCase;

abstract class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends TestCase
{

    protected $fields = [
{% for field in entity.fieldManager.list %}
        '{{ field.name }}',
{% endfor %}
    ];

    protected function getURI(string $path = '')
    {
        $uri = "/{{ entity.snakeCase }}";
        if ($path) {
            $uri = $uri . '/' . $path;
        }
        return $uri;
    }

    /**
     * @param array $attributes
     * @return {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}
     */
    protected function make(array $attributes = [])
    {
        $item = {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}::factory()->make($attributes);
        return $item;
    }

    /**
     * @param array $attributes
     * @return {{ model.getClassName(entity) }}
     */
    protected function makeSave(array $attributes = [])
    {
        $item = $this->make($attributes);
        $item->save();
        return $item;
    }

}

list.name: Destroy
list.template:
<?php

namespace {{ layer.getNameSpace(project, entity) }};

class {{ layer.getClassName(entity) }} extends {{ base.getClassName(entity) }}
{

    public function testDelete()
    {
        $user = $this->login();
        $item = $this->makeSave(['user_id' => $user->id]);
        $response = $this->deleteJson($this->getURI($item->id));
        $response->assertSuccessful();
    }

}

list.name: FakerNameMap

list.name: check
radio
radio01
list.value:
<label>
    <input v-model="item.${field.name}" :value="0" class="form-control" type="radio" /> 0 </label>
<label>
    <input v-model="item.${field.name}" :value="1" class="form-control" type="radio" /> 1 </label>

list.name: radioTrueFalse
list.value:
<label>
    <input v-model="item.${field.name}" :value="true" class="form-control" type="radio" /> true </label>
<label>
    <input v-model="item.${field.name}" :value="false" class="form-control" type="radio" /> false </label>

list.name: select
list.value:
<select v-model="item.${field.name}" class="form-control">
    <option v-for="option in options" :key="option" :value="option" v-text="option"></option>
</select>

list.name: FieldTypeInteger
list.description: for Field Validation (if field type found in this list, then add rule integer)

list.name: FieldTypeNumeric
list.description: for Field Validation (if field type found in this list, then add rule numeric)

list.name: FieldTypeMySQL
list.description: MySQL type (tag is FieldType. used to convert MySQL type to Laravel type)

list.name: FieldTypePGSQL
list.description: PostgreSQL type (tag is FieldType. used to convert PostgreSQL type to Laravel type)

list.name: ValidationNameMap
list.description: for Field Validation (tag is name in ValidationRule)
